text: James Sie (born December 18, 1962) is an American stand-up comedian, actor, voice artist, and comedian, best known as the voice of Monkey in Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness and as the Cabbage Merchant in Avatar: The Last Airbender. ==Early life== Sie was born in Summit, New Jersey. ==Filmography== Year Title Role Notes 2011-present Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness Monkey Television series ==Video games== Year Title Role Notes 2008 Kung Fu Panda Monkey Replacing Jackie Chan 2011 Kung Fu Panda 2 Monkey Replacing Jackie Chan ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Comedians from New Jersey Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:actors from New Jersey Category:1974 births Category:Living people Category:People from Summit, New Jersey
title: James Sie
